SRP.Q: In 1980, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing District Alpha relative to Crimson Quarter?
SRP.A: In 1980, District Alpha is {above} Crimson Quarter in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Outer Rim Settlements, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1984 relative to that in 1982 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Outer Rim Settlements, the data point in 1984 is {below} and to the {right} of the data point in 1982.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Crimson Quarter's Life Expectancy levels?
VPR.A: Crimson Quarter's life expectancy levels show a {periodic stable} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Outer Rim Settlements's Life Expectancy levels?
VPR.A: Outer Rim Settlements's life expectancy levels show a {bimodal peak} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of District Alpha's Life Expectancy levels?
VPR.A: District Alpha's life expectancy levels show a {bimodal peak} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Verdant Ward's Life Expectancy levels?
VPR.A: Verdant Ward's life expectancy levels show a {bimodal valley} trend.

VE.A: Stellar City Core's life expectancy in 1963 is {49.84} years.

VE.A: Sector Beta's life expectancy in 1976 is {100.75} years.

VE.Q: What are the life expectancy of Outer Rim Settlements, District Alpha, and Verdant Ward in 1978?
VE.A: Outer Rim Settlements's life expectancy is {94.66} years, District Alpha's life expectancy is {171.08} years, Verdant Ward's life expectancy is {16.51} years.

EVJ.A: The global minimum life expectancy is {14.15} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Life Expectancy in the line chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum life expectancy is {175.17} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Life Expectancy level recorded for Crimson Quarter?

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Life Expectancy level recorded for Crimson Quarter?
EVJ.A: Crimson Quarter's lowest recorded level is approximately {49.81} years in {1977}.

SC.A: The rate of no change in District Alpha's life expectancy is {0.00}%.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Stellar City Core's Life Expectancy?

NF.Q: Which years did Outer Rim Settlements's Life Expectancy exceed 87 years? Please list the years and corresponding values.
NF.A: {96.85} years in {1965} year, {94.66} years in {1978} year, {96.43} years in {1966} year.

NF.Q: Which years did Verdant Ward's Life Expectancy below 17 years? Please list the years and corresponding values.
NF.A: {16.51} years in {1967} year, {14.15} years in {1965} year, {14.66} years in {1979} year.

NF.Q: In the year 1966, which line had Life Expectancy exceed 100 years? Please list the lines and corresponding values.
NF.A: {Sector Beta} had {101} years, {District Alpha} had {174} years.

NF.Q: In the year 1974, which lines had Life Expectancy between 75 and 124 years? Please list the lines and corresponding values.
NF.A: {Crimson Quarter} had {81} years, {Outer Rim Settlements} had {83} years.

NC.Q: Was Crimson Quarter's Life Expectancy in 1977 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The life expectancy in 1977 was {lower} than in 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1983, which line experienced the largest change in Life Expectancy, Stellar City Core, Sector Beta, Outer Rim Settlements, or Verdant Ward?
NC.A: {Stellar City Core} experienced the largest change in life expectancy.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1977, which line had the highest average Life Expectancy, Crimson Quarter, Stellar City Core, or Verdant Ward?
NC.A: {Crimson Quarter} had the highest average life expectancy.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1980, which line had the highest average Life Expectancy, District Alpha, Crimson Quarter, or Sector Beta?
NC.A: {District Alpha} had the highest average life expectancy.

MSR.Q: Which label shows the largest fluctuation in the line chart?
MSR.A: The label with the largest fluctuation is {Sector Beta}.

MSR.Q: Which line shows the fastest average growth rate between 1965 and 1967?
MSR.A: {Stellar City Core} has the fastest average growth rate between 1965 and 1967.

MSR.Q: In which year did Stellar City Core first surpass Outer Rim Settlements?
MSR.A: Stellar City Core first surpassed Outer Rim Settlements in the year {1986}.

MSR.Q: Which label had the leading life expectancy since 1970?
MSR.A: Since 1970, {District Alpha} had the leading life expectancy.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the District Alpha. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(7 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1958, 1965, 1973, 1978, 1980, 1981, 1987}.
